sentences.en: A robin was pecking at crumbs on the ground.
sentences.cn: 一只知更鸟在地上啄食面包渣。

sentences.en: A robin was perching on the fence.
sentences.cn: 一只知更鸟落在篱笆上。

sentences.en: Air Chief Marshal Sir Robin Hall
sentences.cn: 空军上将罗宾∙霍尔爵士

sentences.en: Batman and his young sidekick Robin
sentences.cn: 蝙蝠侠和他的年轻助手罗宾

sentences.en: He gave Robin a mildly quizzical glance.
sentences.cn: 他有些惊讶地瞥了罗宾一眼。
知更鸟叫起来是哪种声音?

sentences.en: Never in his life had Robin ailed before.
Robin didn't feel good about herself as a person.
sentences.cn: 罗宾不喜欢自己的为人。

sentences.en: Robin is an expert at cheesemaking.
Robin never really liked him at all.
sentences.cn: 罗宾从未真正喜欢过他。

sentences.en: The horseman came up to Robin Hood, brandishing his sword.
sentences.cn: 那个骑士挥舞着剑,来到罗宾汉面前.

sentences.en: The robin carols from the treetops its loud, hearty strain.
sentences.cn: 知更鸟在树顶上尽情地大声歌唱。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 罗宾汉；（罗宾汉式的）绿林好汉
罗宾·威廉姆斯（喜剧巨星）
循环赛；一系列；联名声明书

trans.tran_cn: 知更鸟，鸫，（签名者不分先后，以避免受责的）圆形签名抗议书（或请愿书）
trans.tran_en: a small European bird with a red breast and brown back
